name: MemberCounterMeta
description: Powerful Telegram bot to do a real-time subscriber or member count for all types of groups and channels.

CHANNEL_OR_GROUP_LIST.description: List of channel and group ids  (Example: -1001357289914 -1001658289913 -1001357223413)

CHANNEL_OR_GROUP_ID.description: Main channel's or group's Telegram id (Example: -1001246808642)

MESSAGE_ID.description: Telegram id of a message from your main channel or group (Example: 10)
